hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #2# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #Nayru's Love#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: One who does not have Triforce can't go in.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Queen Gohma# holds...^ #a Green Rupee# and #Magic Beans#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Dodongo's Cavern# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Red Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Eye Statue Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Gerudo Training Ground final reward# contains #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that looking into darkness may find darkness looking back into you.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Spirit Temple#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #a Shadow Temple Small Key# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path to the #Spirit Medallion#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hammer Room Switch Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Volvagia# holds...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: It's so lonely being stuck here with nobody else to talk to...

SFM (Saria).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #3# major items.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Din's Fire# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #0# major items.
